content: {"name": "North Brooklyn Angels - Mobile Soup Kitchen ( Havemeyer Street)", "alternate_name": "", "description": " A meal is served right outside their Community Kitchen.\n Meals are available on a first come, first served basis and may all be distributed within 15-20 minutes (give or take) upon arrival, depending on the weather, holiday season, and other variables.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.northbrooklynangels.org/meals/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1 Havemeyer Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Williamsburg", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "11211", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.7162, "longitude": -73.95281489999999}, "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:45", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed During Year: Inclement weather"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Meal delivery available for seniors"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Mobile soup kitchen truck"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Bulk food distribution is via: Free pop up green markets at meal sites."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "First come, first serve: open until food runs out"}]}
